name: FermaxWay-FiPlus
0:
”Alexa, show entrance”
”Alexa, open the door”
”Alexa, answer”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To use the Fermax Way-Fi Plus skill you need to:
-Have the Alexa app or an Alexa smart speaker, with or without display, configured and working.
-Have your Fermax Way-Fi Plus video door entry system installed and connected to the Internet.
-Have the account with which you have registered in Way-Fi Plus
-Have linked your Way-Fi Plus account with your Alexa account
